es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel
Class ConditionDrivenGenerator

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.SimulationObject
      es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.VariableStoreSimulationObject
          es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.TimeStampedSimulationObject
              es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.BasicElement
                  es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.Generator
                      es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel.ConditionDrivenGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Debuggable, Identifiable, SimulationObject, VariableStore, java.lang.Comparable<SimulationObject>
public abstract class ConditionDrivenGenerator
extends Generator

A generator driven by simulation events. Generates the elements when certain condition/s is/are triggered.

The user of this class should add the following code every time the condition/s is/are triggered: addEvent(new GenerateEvent(ts));

Author:
Iván Castilla Rodríguez

public ConditionDrivenGenerator(Simulation simul,

Creates a generator driven by simulation events.

Parameters:
simul - Simulation which uses this generator
creator - The way the elements are created every time the condition is triggered
